name: The Dark End 2 (Char13s)
description:
The game is a scrapped prototype still under small construction. Play the demo for now!

Return to the Dark End once more to fight your way through hordes of dark creatures, only this time you'll have many dark abilities of your own at your disposal .

Use weapons from other realms gifted to you by people you save.

Customize your fighting style by choosing your weapons and skills that you wish to use.

And don't forget to knock plenty of skulls to power up your weapons to get the most out of them, and unlocking more skills to add to your power!

After everyone is saved, fight the final boss and destroy the Dark end once and for all!
